Title: The Great Journey
Actors: Nicolas CazalÃ©, Mohamed Majd, Jacky Nercessian, Ghina Ognianova
Plot: Reda, a young French-Moroccan guy and his old father drive from the south of France to Mecca in order for the father to do his pilgrimage. At first distant, they gradually learn to know each other.
Language: Arabic, French, Bulgarian, Serbo-Croatian, Turkish, Italian, English
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 4 wins & 2 nominations.
